name: Borderlands 2: Mr. Torgue's Campaign of Carnage
name_original: Borderlands 2: Mr. Torgue's Campaign of Carnage
description:
Borderlands 2: Mr. Torgue's Campaign of Carnage is an action, shooter and RPG game developed by Gearbox Software. It came out on 20-11-2012. It was published by 2K Games. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Borderlands 2: Mr. Torgue's Campaign of Carnage on PC and PlayStation 3.
